name: Stahlregen - Bass Pulsing x Solar Flare (PS2)

shapecode_3_g2=1.000

shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=count1 = .875;
per_frame_init_2=count2 = .625;
per_frame_init_3=count3 = .375;
per_frame_init_4=count4 = .125;
per_frame_1=step = (.25+.5*bass_att)/fps;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=count1 = if(below(count1,1),count1+step,count1-1);
per_frame_4=count2 = if(below(count2,1),count2+step,count2-1);
per_frame_5=count3 = if(below(count3,1),count3+step,count3-1);
per_frame_6=count4 = if(below(count4,1),count4+step,count4-1);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=q1 = count1;
per_frame_9=q2 = count2;
per_frame_10=q3 = count3;
per_frame_11=q4 = count4;
per_frame_12= 
per_frame_13=warp = .075;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=wave_g = .7+.3*sin(time*1.8);
per_frame_16=wave_b = .65+.25*sin(time*3);
per_frame_17=wave_r = .47+.3*cos(time*.75);
per_pixel_1=wave1 = above(rad,q1)*below(rad,q1+.1);
per_pixel_2=wave2 = above(rad,q2)*below(rad,q2+.1);
per_pixel_3=wave3 = above(rad,q3)*below(rad,q3+.1);
per_pixel_4=wave4 = above(rad,q4)*below(rad,q4+.1);
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=wave = wave1+wave2+wave3+wave4;
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=sx = 1.025-.05*wave;
per_pixel_9=sy = 1.025-.05*wave;
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=zoom = 1+.05*above(rad,rand(100)*.01);
per_pixel_12=
per_pixel_13=warp = .5*bass_att*above(rad,.5*treb_att);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    
warp_7=`ret += max(
warp_8=`max(GetPixel(uv+float2(1.5,0)*texsize.wz),GetPixel(uv-float2(1.5,0)*texsize.wz)),
warp_9=`max(GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1.5)*texsize.wz),GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1.5)*texsize.wz)));
warp_10=`ret -= GetPixel(uv);
warp_11=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_12=`ret = ret*.94-.003; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_13=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    //flexi's bump map effect
comp_4=`
comp_5=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*4; 
comp_6=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) ); 
comp_7=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) ); 
comp_8=`    float2 light_pos = float2(0.5,0.2); 
comp_9=`    float3 col = float3(4,4,4); 
comp_10=`    float c = 4; 
comp_11=`    float dd = 16; 
comp_12=`    float3 plastic; 
comp_13=`    plastic.x = col.x/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_14=`    plastic.y = col.y/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_15=`    plastic.z = col.z/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_16=`
comp_17=`    ret = plastic*GetPixel(uv); 
comp_18=`    ret *= 3;
comp_19=`
comp_20=`ret.xy = 0;
comp_21=`ret.x += lerp(lerp(0,2,lerp(0,ret.z,uv.x)),lerp(0,2,lerp(0,ret.z,1-uv.x)),uv.x);
comp_22=`ret.z += lerp(0,.4,lerp(0,ret.z,1-uv.y));
comp_23=`
comp_24=`
comp_25=`}
